title: Predicting El Niño with Machine Learning
description: Leveraging decades of climate data to create ENSOcast, an accessible tool for understanding El Niño–Southern Oscillation.

title: Harnessing Data Science for Wildfire Management
description: Understanding how artificial intelligence can be leveraged to detect and predict wildfire spread within the United States.

title: Rebuilding Coral Reefs with Data
description: Transforming coral reef restoration through predictive modeling and photomosaic technology.

title: Exploring the Morality of Animal Testing
description: An examination of the ethical considerations surrounding animal testing in scientific research.

title: Solving Ethical Dilemmas
description: An exploration of whether ethical dilemmas can be resolved in a socially acceptable manner.

title: Evaluating Lyrics using NLP
description: Developing a model that analyzes song lyrics and themes using natural language processing.

title: Using AI and CGI in Music
description: Discussing how artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the way we perceive music.

title: Understanding Bias in AI
description: Acknowledging biases in artificial intelligence algorithms and practices.

title: AI Roadmap for High School Students
description: Framing a college roadmap for high school students interested in artificial intelligence.
